00104     virtual int32_t reopen_fd() {
00105       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00106       if (m_fd != -1)
00107         m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00108       m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00109       return m_fd;
00110     }
